text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Creek, over here!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I'll be right there. Just give me one<n>second to squish my
bag into a<n>locker... There! Oh no, it won't close<n>all the
way...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Cause ya packed enough junk for a<n>family of four. Forget
it, I'm gonna go<n>track down Bourbon! Lemme know<n>when
you finish here!

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Ah. Aaaah... Auaaagh...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Wha—what the heck? I almost took ya<n>for a real zombie.
That getup'd have<n>the tykes cryin' the whole way<n>home...

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaack?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ah! That shout just now...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, Rice's voice is softer than that. I'll<n>have to keep
searching.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon?! Eep!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Owww...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Tamamo?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
W-whoops... Wait, Rice?! And<n>Bourbon too! Glad I found ya,
I've<n>got—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Beep.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Beep. Beep. Beep. Beep. Beep.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What... the hell is goin' on here? My<n>phone's goin' crazy!
Heh... Hehehe. Fouuund you. ♪

text_block_list.name: The Four
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! Eep!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Got you! ♪ Now you're mine forever.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Geez, Cree—Wait, what on earth is dat<n>outfit?!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, we still have the costume<n>fittings, so I figured I'd try
mine on. I<n>brought yours too! ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Let me know if you want to go get<n>changed. I'll help you put
it on. ♪

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I-I don't know what it is, Creek, but...<n>you seem different
today.

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaagh...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah! Not another one!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh my, look how dirty you've gotten<n>yourself. Come here.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Poor baby—your arm's all scuffed up.<n>Let me get you all
patched up with a<n>bandage.

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Ahh... maaah... mah?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, hold still now. There, now we<n>match.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Just. Like. Mummy! ♪ Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Zombie
text_block_list.text: Muh, Mummy... Mummyyy...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Yes, sweetie! I'll do my best to be<n>everyone's mummy this
Halloween. ♪<n>Hehe. There, there... ♪

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oh, hell no... Why're ya playin'house with it? And the zombie—why's the zombie playin'along?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Maybe the outfit makes Creek<n>stronger? Kind of like... our
racewear?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ...So the clothes do make theracer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The clothes?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I've read that people used to wear<n>scary costumes to
disguise<n>themselves, but now, we have<n>costumes of fun
things too.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Halloween is a day to dress up and<n>dare to be someone
else. You can<n>borrow the costume's power to say<n>things
you can't say yourself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's very intriguing.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that last bit wasn't in the book,<n>though. That was just
my<n>interpretation of it...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Information provided is not currently<n>logged in Mission:
"Cross-Dorm<n>Halloween Party" reference files.<n>Potential
for data collection, confirmed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Adding new task to queue: enjoy<n>theme park.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Wait for us, Bourbon—we're<n>goin' too! You're who
we're all here<n>for in the first place!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'll tag along too. I'm always<n>happy to chaperone. ♪
